Text:
How the H**L do I make it play another audiotrack (NOT German!)?

I thoght DivX-files only could contain one audiotrack.  If that is so, this one has only German!  :-b
(And it's a rather poor dubbing too!  :-(  )
tried this with several media players including vlc player. there is definately only 1 audio track and its german.
Complete Bullshit. It only has one audio and its German. No English or Sweden.

THIS DOES NOT CONTAIN WHAT IS ANNOUNCED!
The movie is only 720x304 :(

This is what mplayer reports:

VIDEO:  [DX50]  720x304  24bpp  25.000 fps  1300.8 kbps (158.8 kbyte/s)
AUDIO: 44100 Hz, 2 ch, s16le, 128.0 kbit/9.07% (ratio: 16000->176400)
Selected audio codec: [mp3] afm: mp3lib (mp3lib MPEG layer-2, layer-3)

So with this description I call it a fake!
